root.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
root.description: OverviewHidden in Plain Sight is a strategy game developed and published by Adam Spragg Games for the Xbox Live Indie Games platform. In several game modes players must first identify themselves on the screen running around in a lot of moving NPCs and then complete a specific goal, e.g. killing the other player, touching five objects or killing a specific NPC. In another mode one player plays as a sniper while up to three other players try to murder NPCs while hiding between them by acting like them. In a racing mode the sniper just one bullet and has to find the PC before he crosses the finish line.
